availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy Smith Blackburn on September 29, 1825. Father of John Blackburn, Allison Blackburn, and A. K. Blackburn. Farmer in Pendleton County in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, District No. 2, p. 333B; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Pendleton County, p. 79; Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records â€“ Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994038, Pendleton County Marriages.
